remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件包括在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]以支持与 Silverlight 的兼容性。The event is included in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] to support compatibility with Silverlight. 如果不需要确保与 Silverlight 的兼容性，使用触控事件，如和上， ，或。If you do not have to ensure compatibility with Silverlight, use the touch events, such as and , on , , or . 事件不使用相同的事件模型为其他 WPF 输入事件，如和。The event does not use the same event model as other WPF input events, such as and . 而不是公开的方法为通过对象树的 UI，可能路由元素特定事件事件是在应用程序级别处理单个事件。Instead of being exposed as an element-specific event that potentially routes through the object tree of a UI, the event is a single event that is handled at the application level. 因此，不能使用`sender`确定涉及哪些元素的事件处理程序参数。Therefore, you cannot use the `sender` parameter of the event handler to determine what element is touched. 使用获取触摸事件相关的值。Use the to get the values that are relevant to the touch event. 从，你可以获取的触摸屏输入，并确定是否已， ，或操作。From the , you can get the of the touch and determine whether the was a , , or action. 你还可以使用获取。You can also use the to get the . 从，你可以确定设备和获取的元素的指针的信息。From the , you can determine the device and get information about the element that is touched. ## Examples 下面的示例可用于在创建简单的模式通过拖动两根手指触摸屏。The following example enables you to create simple patterns on a by dragging two fingers across a touchscreen. 每次触摸由。通过在触摸提供的触摸点之间绘制一条线创建模式。Each touch is represented by a .The pattern is created by drawing a line between the touch points provided by the touches. 此示例需要兼容的 Windows 触摸屏幕。This example requires a Windows Touch–compatible screen. 下面的标记创建的用户界面，其中包括的中间。The following markup creates the user interface, which consists of a that is centered in a .
